title: Dhoni
plot: A 14 year old boy aspires to become an attacking wicketkeeper-batsman, where his father wants his son to become a MBA graduate.

Karthik (Akash) is a 14-year old son of Subramaniam (Prakash Raj) a middle class government employee. But there is one thing he is obsessed and passionate about and that is cricket. His inspiration is _Dhoni_ (qv) and like him, he wants to be an attacking wicket Keeper- batsman, and his coach (Nassar) sees a great potential in him. At school, Karthik struggles with numbers and to make sense of them, falling way behind his classmates, much to the frustration of his teachers and his father who wants to see his son to be an MBA graduate.::Captain

Insightful and inspiring, this intense family drama follows a father's journey and struggle to heal his handicapped son and motivate him towards an active and productive life. While his father has many dreams for his son in the field of academics, his son is deeply passionate about cricket and hopes to follow the example of his Idol, Mahendra Singh _Dhoni_ (qv), the captain of the Indian cricket team. Will his father come forward to assist him in transforming his life and help him achieve his goal?::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
